books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: Detective Renée Ballard teams up with the retired detective Harry Bosch, who is working on a cold case.
books.name: DARK SACRED NIGHT

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: A man who is losing weight without getting thinner forms an unlikely alliance with his neighbors who are dealing with prejudices.
books.name: ELEVATION

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A decorated World War II veteran shoots and kills a pastor inside a Mississippi church.
books.name: THE RECKONING

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: Difficult choices surface when Hope Anderson and Tru Walls meet in a North Carolina seaside town.
books.name: EVERY BREATH

books.author: by Nalini Singh
books.description: The 11th book in the Guild Hunter series.
books.name: ARCHANGEL'S PROPHECY

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Barbara Kingsolver
books.description: Intertwined stories of two families who live in different centuries on the same street corner in Vineland, N.J.
books.name: UNSHELTERED

books.author: by Mitch Albom
books.description: The sequel to "The Five People You Meet in Heaven" follows Annie on her heavenly journey.
books.name: THE NEXT PERSON YOU MEET IN HEAVEN

books.author: by Diana Palmer
books.description: As her body heals, the champion ice-skater Karina Carter helps Micah Torrance look after his ranch and his daughter.
books.name: WYOMING LEGEND

books.author: by Susan Stoker
books.description: The ninth book in the Delta Force Heroes series.
books.name: RESCUING MARY

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Virgil Flowers investigates shootings in a Minnesota town following an attempt to revive its ailing economy.
books.name: HOLY GHOST

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: The lives of patients, doctors and activists intersect when a gunman holds them all hostage in a woman's health center in Mississippi.
books.name: A SPARK OF LIGHT

books.author: by James Patterson and James O. Born
books.description: Michael Bennett discovers that an assassin is targeting him and his family.
books.name: AMBUSH

books.author: by Brandon Sanderson
books.description: The third volume of the Stormlight Archive. The War of Reckoning ends and the Voidbringers return.
books.name: OATHBRINGER
